CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND( NOT(ISNULL(Territory__c)), CONTAINS(TEXT(HCP_Agreement__c), "Signed") || CONTAINS(TEXT(HCP_Agreement__c), "No Stipend") || CONTAINS(TEXT(HCP_Agreement__c), "W-9 Only") , Ninety_Days_Activity__c > 0), "Active", IF ( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Territory__c)), CONTAINS(TEXT(HCP_Agreement__c), "Signed") || CONTAINS(TEXT(HCP_Agreement__c), "No Stipend") || CONTAINS(TEXT(HCP_Agreement__c), "W-9 Only"), Ninety_Days_Activity__c < 1), "Passive", IF ( AND( Owner.Start_Date__c > (today() - 100), NOT(ISNULL(Territory__c)), Ninety_Days_Activity__c > 2), "Active",
NULL)))
CustomField.label: HCP Status
